phase.text: Glad you could make it. I'm Digg!
An earthquake appeared out of nowhere, which caused the volcano to erupt! The time portal became unstable and started leaking out the old landscape.

userResponse.option: Oh wow! What places were affected?

phase.text: Everywhere in the bin was affected. As you can see Mulch Island was affected by a volcanic eruption!
Haha, guess you didn't like the new bin?

Some places have kept intact, like Flum's Fountain and Dosh's Palace. However, we have had to put a gigantic tank below the fountain at Flum's Fountain to keep the ground saturated with nutrients to keep the mushrooms growing!

userResponse.option: Thank you for letting me know!

phase.text: See you around soon. Feel free to look around the bin. We've rebuilt a few areas on new land so you can explore the 2010 and 2014 bin.
